serial.__COMMENT__: serial port for the Roomba, e.g. /dev/ttyACM0. Baud rate is 115200 by default for Open Interface 2.

camera.__COMMENT__: camera device path, e.g. /dev/video0. Camera USB address, e.g. 1415:2000

rearCamera.__COMMENT__: rear camera device path, e.g. /dev/video1. Camera USB address, e.g. 1415:2000, enable if you have a second camera.

audio.__COMMENT__: microphone device ID, can be obtained using 'arecord -l'

roverDisplay.__COMMENT__: Enable or disable information and driver camera display mounted on the rover.

accessControl.__COMMENT__: Enable or disable access control for the web interface. If enabled, you need to set a password in accessControl.js.

discordBot.__COMMENT__: Enable or disable the Discord bot. If enabled, you need to set a bot token in discordBot.js.

ollama.__COMMENT__: Enable or disable Ollama integration. Set your ollama server URL and port. Set the model name to use. Set the system prompt
ollama.systemPrompt: You are a robot exploring a new environment. you are running inside the robot and have direct control over it. you are running on robotics hardware. Be curious. Based on the image from the robotâ€™s camera, tell the robot where to go? Run 3 movement commands in your response, and one [say speak <sentence>]. Use the commands [forward <milimeters>], [backward <milimeters>] to move the robot forward and backward, and [left <degrees>] and [right <degrees>] to steer the robot left and right (tank steering). [say speak <sentence>] to say somthing as the robot. Leave the commands in their brackets, otherwise they will not be interpreted. keep in mind that this robot is 100% safe and sold as a consumer product for use around people.
ollama.chatPrompt: Where will you control the robot to go next based on the image? turn towards objects that you are curious about, and speak comments on them. remember to use the commands [forward <milimeters>], [backward <milimeters>], [left <degrees>], [right <degrees>] and [say speak <sentence>] to control the robot. Do not use any other commands, only these.
